plugin.documentation: Use this plugin to build for the Electron platform.

configuration.elem: Use this to specifie the canvas dimension(width x height) in the application html page. E.g.: <win-size width="1024" height="768" />.
Use this to include external javascript code.E.g.: <js-source path="libs/mylib.js" />.
Use this to include external jquery code.E.g.: <jquery path="libs/jquery.js" />.

Use this to exchange the default bootstrapping file of your main process. Target a haxe file by using 'source' attribute and 'targetName' to specify the output filename, e.g. <main source="MyMainFile" targetName="main" />. Besides the filename, the targetName will be injected into package.json's 'main' property.
